name: AI Enemy System
description: Complete AI system with pathfinding, combat logic, and state machines for Godot 4. Perfect for creating intelligent enemies.

name: Multiplayer Kit
description: Full multiplayer networking solution with player sync, lobby system, and matchmaking for Godot 4.

name: Vehicle System
description: Complete vehicle driving system with passenger support, physics, and mobile controls for Godot 4.

name: Gun Combat System
description: Production-ready shooting mechanics with recoil, reloading, and multiplayer sync for Godot 4.

name: Melee Combat System
description: Complete melee combat with combos, blocking, and damage system for Godot 4.

name: Supabase Auth Integration
description: Ready-to-use Supabase authentication with email/password, social login, and user management.

name: Battle Royale System
description: Complete battle royale mechanics including shrinking zone, spawn system, and victory conditions.

name: Inventory System
description: Drag-and-drop inventory with item stacking, equipment slots, and save/load support.

name: Character Controller
description: Smooth 3D character controller with jumping, crouching, sprinting, and mobile touch controls.

name: AI Zombie System
description: Zombie AI with pathfinding, attacking, and multiplayer synchronization for horror games.
